options.content:
## Traces dashboard

When a trace backend (e.g. Tempo or Jaeger) is added to the stack:

- Configure a Grafana datasource for the trace store.
- Add panels or links to trace explorer / trace ID search.
- Optionally add span count or duration metrics derived from traces.

**Current setup:** The app sends traces to the OTel Collector (debug exporter). Add an exporter (e.g. OTLP to Tempo) in the collector config and provision a trace datasource in Grafana to enable this dashboard.
